EmailTemplate.name: SWBR-202309-EMP-HCT-SHRM-WEBINAR.01c - Invite #3 (Last chance to register for ou
EmailTemplate.subject: Last chance to register for our upcoming webinar
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
WEBINAR New research: 5 ways employers can put healthcare within reach of all employees Tuesday, September 19, 2023 12 p.m. Eastern Teladoc Health recently fielded a survey of more than 300 HR benefit decision-makers to learn how they remain competitive by building innovative, high-value benefits for a diverse workforce in the context of challenging market trends.
Join Dr. Alexander Alonso, SHRM Chief Knowledge Officer, and Kelly Bliss, President of U.S. Group Health at Teladoc Health for a look through the research and discussion on what it means for employers in any industry. About Teladoc Health: Teladoc Health is transforming the healthcare experience and empowering people everywhere to live healthier lives. Recognized as the world leader in whole-person virtual care, Teladoc Health leverages more than a decade of expertise and data-driven insights to meet the growing virtual care needs of consumers and healthcare professionals.
